Archive of Seventeenth-Century Italian Madrigals and Arias (ASCIMA)

Link
www.ascima.bham.ac.uk
Status
active
How they describe themselves
archive
Blurb
The ASCIMA website provides full critical editions of entire volumes of secular vocal music which has been edited from printed part-books. Current holdings include madrigal collections by Tarquinio Merula, Claudio Monteverdi, Martino Pesenti, Giovanni Rovetta, Barbara Strozzi, and Giuseppe Valentini. Both single works and entire opuses can be downloaded as single files. Sound files are provided for each work.
Creator(s)
John Whenham
Steward(s)
University of Birmingham
